title: The history of the damnable popish plot, in its various branches and progress published for the satisfaction of the present and future ages / by the authors of The weekly pacquet of advice from Rome.
author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.
publisher: Printed for B.R., L.W., H.C., and are to be sold by Langley Curtiss ...,
notes: Ascribed to Henry Care, and Robinson. Cf. Arber, E. Term catalogues, v. 1, p. 524; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in British Library.
